scripts.local: node reflector.js "{useCache:false, useGzip:true, useTls:true, debug:true, http:8080, https:8443, hostname:simpatico.local, cert:localhost.crt, key:localhost.key }"
scripts.prod: node reflector.js  "{http:80, https:443, ws:8081, hostname:simpatico.io, cert:/etc/letsencrypt/live/simpatico.io/fullchain.pem, key:/etc/letsencrypt/live/simpatico.io/privkey.pem, useCache:true, useTls:true, useGzip:true, runAsUser:josh }"
